scripts.build-emmet: shx mkdir -p dist/emmet/emmet-core && shx cp -rf node_modules/emmet/lib/* dist/emmet/emmet-core
scripts.build-src: inlinejs -o dist/emmet.js src/emmet.js && shx cp -rf src/emmet dist
scripts.build-lib: shx cp -rf lib/filestream/filestream.js dist/emmet && shx cp -rf node_modules/caniuse-db/data.json dist/emmet/caniuse.json && shx cp -rf node_modules/jn-npp-cjs-require/cjs-require.js dist/emmet
scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build-src && npm run build-lib && npm run build-emmet
